Table	Create Table
accounts	CREATE TABLE `accounts` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `platform` enum('twitter','tiktok','instagram','facebook') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `username` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `password` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending','active','suspended','failed') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `deviceId` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `lastLoginAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `proxyId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `xHandle` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `persona` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  UNIQUE KEY `username_platform_idx` (`username`,`platform`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=480001
